overview: Currently, Martha Street has become a "Hotspot" for heroin dealing, consumption, prostitution and petty crime. The Shadwell Youth Club finds itself at the centre of unsafe surroundings with young people threatened by local dealers returning from mosque, to youth workers finding knives hidden on the Centre's allotment, to dealers selling in broad-daylight to their clients in front of the club as home-schooling mothers arrive with their children.
title: The Martha Street Experience
